content.detailedDescription: Me and two buddies were 16 years old we were out late one night at an old church in salem oregon were sitting there drinking beer it was saw a star in the sky moving it's slowly made its way down towards us and all the sudden it was right on top of us are one of my friends started freaking out screaming do you see that do you see that can you see thatand within one second of my buddy freaking out on this aberration it was gone instantly just disappeared you could see it leaving what it just turned into a pinpoint in the sky and disappeared
content.summary: It came right down on us watched us for a couple minutes my buddy freaked out yelling and it left without a trace or sound

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: We were sitting at a camp fire at our neighbors house for about 2 hous just hanging out looking at the stars when we were done we packed up our stuff and started walking back to our house.Then i decided to look back up at the sky and i see this bright star like object moving right to left above the field then it started moving fast twards me and my dad. we saw it moving fast then it got right above us then it took a quick left and then it went up straight up and out of sight in about 60 seconds. we thought it was a space station or a star. we felt creeped out because we knew a plain couldent move that fast and make sharp turns and make no noise.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Came in very fast from the firld in our back yard was very bright and moved then made turns then whent straight up then dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: On december 24, 2011 approx. 11:30pm over city of sonoma, california me and my wife saw floating gold glowing objects directly overhead (over our house). we were setting up our son's new portable basketball hoop / post assembly at night. we were looking directly overhead building the basketball set. at first we did not know what these 7 lights / globes were (traveling from north to south direction). later we thought they may have been chinese lanterns. they seemed to be floating high (approx. 300-500ft) almost dancing overhead until they formed the big dipper star pattern and stayed in that formation until they floated out of site towards southern horizon. at first we joked that just saw ufo(s) and then we just kept sighting to ourselves (until now june 20, 2015). later we did buy a set of chinese lanterns and flew them over town at night a year later (2012). they were distinctive lights but did not seem the same as xmas 2011 ufo(s). eventually the chinese lanterns that we bought 2012 did burn out at 50 feet over our neighborhood. i was watching mufon - "hangar one" program on history channel and decided to finally to set it to record.
content.summary: 7 glowing objects thought to be chinese lanterns until they formed lg. dipper star pattern (not the real lg. dipper)

content.detailedDescription:
My husband was on a rare trip out of town and i was alone sleeping when i heard what sounded like many people whispering, but could not figure out what they were saying, next i felt a metal disc scanning the back of my body (i was laying on my side), i tried to get up, bumped into the object, because it freaked me out, but was paralyzed and could not move, next thing i know i was put to sleep. i went to a hypnotherapist to be taken back to the scene and when i got there i saw the room and bed but it was if a pair of scissors had cut me out of the picture.

the next weird thing that happened to me was i was woken up in the middle of the night with a voice in my head repeating over and over and loudly "auditory vibrations" i got up to go to the bathroom and i said aloud "what is that" and the same voice replied "that is how we communicate with you."

i am writing to you because i was watching hangar 1: the ufo files and wondered if you had received any other stories like mine?
content.summary: Sleeping alone in the middle of the night, heard voices whispering, then felt object scanning my back (i was laying on my side) when i attempted to get up i was paralyzed and could not move, then was put to sleep.

content.detailedDescription: It was a small like that was about the same size as the stars in the sky but it started moving towards me and just before it got over me it shot off at a ttememdousr speed at a ninth degree angle to the northeast.
content.summary: Object was was in the south west sky then approached and shot off to the northeast.

content.detailedDescription: It was early morning 2:30 am, very dark i was on a fishing pier, fishing. the fishing pier is well lit so it is difficult to see anything beyond the pier. i was standing on the southern end of the pier were it was less lit, all the lights are on the north side of the pier. i was standing there looking at the stars facing east and i noticed the stars started to disappear.I enjoy looking at stars and thought it was very strange they  were disappearing like a black curtain was being pulled across the sky. i put my hand up to block the light from the north end of the pier, as i did i noticed, the only way to describe it, was what looked like very large wooden planks that were a rustic color that were horizontal to my position. the pier over looks the chesapeake bay there is no visible shore lines its like looking out at an ocean. the entire sky was covered by this craft that looked similar to the bottom of a very large wooden rustic flat bottom boat traveling side ways. it covered the sky from as far as i could see north and south and was half the size from east to west. i watched it rise from the horizon in the east and as it pasted over head i turned around and watched it disappear to the west never changing speed i almost felt if i jumped up i could almost touch it, it looked that close, it took about 4 minutes from horizon to horizon no sound at all. there were four other people on the north side of the pier but the lights are so bright on that side you cant even see the stars, i felt i had to call someone over to see what i was seeing but i felt frozen and confused. i have no idea of how high up the craft was i just know it filled the sky, i have a very difficult time trying to rationalize what i saw how can anything so large be in the sky . .
content.summary: Huge rectangle craft flew right over me

content.detailedDescription:
The day before the sighting in our new paper they had  a story about a truck driver seeing a ufo in a field along enter state 90   they said he seen a helicopter along interstate 90  my uncle said a truck driver would  not stop his rig to look at a helicopter .Witch makes since.The next evening our friends came over with there 5 week old daughter.Fred went out in the kitchen to pour a cup of coffee .When he notice a strange light my back yard. he call me .The light looked like a light bulb. then all of a sudden the light took  shape of a saucer. fred and i went outside .  we watch it u could see like a ring of fire around the outside of it, i then went in  and called the police station . when i called them they said was this a prank. i said no my name  is james ball i live in the evans estates.Witch is less then a mile from the station. i then went and got my deer rifle went back outside and watch it with a 4 power scope. the police come running my drive way the one cop had machine gun not sure what the had. he said to me. did  you shoot at it. i said hell no i was in the navy.This rifle would not knock it out the air.The cop took my rifle and he watch it, it then went  up and headed north toward the lake the police follow it.

fred an i  follow the police down to the beach. it went out over the lake it hover then it look like a light came out of  the bottom of it toward the water it look like the water spun up to ship. light went out. in about 3 seconds it headed out over the lake toward canada and was gone. next day in the new paper that mill creek couple seen a weather blimp from new york. 2 days later air force called me.Made appointment to see my wife and me, they came to my house 2 air force cars pull up in front of my house they come  and interduce them selfe. the first thing they asked us was our religion  i do not know what religion   has to do with  it. then they showed us a book.Asked us witch one we seen. i pointed it out.  i said if that ship ours why our we spending all the money to send a rocked to venus  next month. they did say they were ufo  from space. and never heard from again                                       mr [name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Just could not believe it but had 4 other seen it 2 were police  officer

content.detailedDescription:
my one ufo (on the ground) sighting

i lived in new hampshire for about a year in 1976-1977 and would jog in the national forest with my large white shepherd. i lived in a rental farm house on passaconaway rd about 10 miles northwest of conway.  my dog and i jogged the same route almost daily in the mornings, as i was ski training.  he was running ahead of me as he often did this one morning in the fall, when i noticed he had stopped, was facing into the brush and was growling. his hackles were full up and his teeth barred. i feared it might be a bear or big cat so i called him off of it, but he wouldn't budge.  not only did i not want him to get hurt but i wanted us both to go back the direction we came from.  then he seemed to totally cower down to the ground in total submission to whatever it was. i was petrified with fear and then i heard the humming, buzzing sound and felt the rumble vibrating through my shoes. i knew that the sound and rumbling sensation would not be an animal but some kind of machine.  i somehow got my nerve up and very cautiously got up near my dog to see what he was staring at.  i was shaking with fear but i felt like i was being pulled in like a magnet would to a metal object. i felt like i had to go to it.  as i got to my dog's side i could hear him wimpering and see he was shaking. we were within 20 feet of this object. 

what i could see through the brush was a grayish/black metal looking object that had a military characteristic to it, but was only about 5 or 6 feet in height and seemed to have a crescent shape, not really a boomerang, but an elongated, rounded crescent shape with blue-greenish lights pulsating at regular intervals. the lights appeared to be emanating from beneath the edges of the form.  it was fully on the ground and appeared to be maybe 30' in diameter or less. the ground vibrated and the humming sound was hypnotic and paralyzing.  for a brief moment, maybe 2 seconds, the humming stopped, the lights stopped and my dog seemed to re-animate and slowly rose and backed off.  i followed suit. we backed out about 4 or 5 steps and i took off running as fast as my body could push, my dog right in front- full speed. when i got home i paced for quite a while, wanted to actually go back again with a camera, but instead called the forest service manager and asked if any vehicles were out there where i described.  they said no, but wanted a lot of detail from me. more than if they thought i was a lunatic or pranking them.  they pressed hard for details.  a few days later i got my nerve up and also took a handgun and my dog and went back to the site.  my dog did not have the same level of fear as he did that day, but he was most definitely still quite hesitant of approaching the site.  i pushed the brush back where i remembered it to be and could tell a large object of the shape i had seen had crushed the brush and ground cover down flat and looked “swept” over at the edges, like frayed leaves.  after that i never jogged that same trail again.  it was just too unnerving.

several times over the next year while in nh, at least 5 times, i could tell that i was being followed. in town, at work, shopping, driving.   i moved back to colorado a year later.  twice on the drive from nh back to colorado i saw the same vehicle following me.  once they actually passd me out on the plains between no where and hell and stayed beside me for far too long, pretending not to look at me.  i’ve told numerous people over the years but i never stop feeling the same fear and remember the paralyzing, hypnotic affect the humming sound had on me and apparently my dog as well.  over the years, and i’m 62 now, i have several times had the sense that a being was in my bedroom or house and i was completely paralyzed, yet wide awake.  my eyes will be wide open, i can feel them blink, but there is absolutely no light – pitch black and claustrophobic.  i feel totally confined, like being in a coffin and i can’t scream or breathe or move.
content.summary: Witnessed a small landed craft in white mountain national forest land in nh in 1976

content.detailedDescription: I know it may sound odd but i have know about aliens as car back as i can remember. the fist time i ever seen one was on a pic in a book at school and i knew what it was immediately and it gave me a scared feeling. i have had a dream several times like all through my life and the come and speak to me but all i see are lights they tell me its time for me to go home and i always have said no as a child i seen myself from above and pleaded with the light to let me stay apparently the did and even as an adult the last time this has happened was about 5 yrs ago once agin the lights told me it was time to go and they explained to me how all this here on earth was training for me and i need to come home. all my life ive had this happen to me the lights speaking with me it will go for yrs without anything then it starts up i know it may sound crazy and i have told few people of it but usually they laugh it off and so do i so i dont look like a nut job lol well thanks for hearing my story curious if anyone else has had anything like this happen?
content.summary: On going since i was a child

content.detailedDescription: The wife and i were in the backyard sitting at our fire pit.  she noticed it first then told me to look, i didn't have my phone.  the bright round silent orb/object was about 70 degrees up and drifted down to the east for about 15 to 20 seconds.  i called twice for my 13 yr old daughter to come out form inside the living room, she never hear the calls until i ran to the door yelled for her to come out asap.  she came out and saw the last second or two.  my wife got a picture with her cell phone but was unable to get video.  i'm a army vet. and it reminded me to a illumination flare but it was bigger, higher, you could stair at the center with naked eye (most flares are too bright to stare at center) and didn't illuminate the ground.  when it hit the east horizon it make a thump/slap sound like hearing a full sheet of plywood hit the concrete from a distance.  the sound was only delayed maybe a second. my wife heard the sound also but my daughter didn't.  when it hit i thought i saw a slight smoke trail but i'm not positive on that.  we took a drive east for about 10 miles but never saw any evidence of impact or fire. size of orb was about a quarter the size of the moon.
content.summary: Bright red orb in eastern sky the that came down in east

content.detailedDescription:
I returned home from getting my motorcycle inspected at 9:48 am 
when i got off my bike and removed my helmet a strange cem trail caught my eye alone with a rainbow circling the sun. i thought it looked pretty cool so i grabbed my cell phone and took a few pictures. i just aimed and hit the button twice. i changed my position so the brightness of the sun would be blocked out by the tree branches. and snapped off 5 more pictures one after the other. i tried to view what i took pictures of but the sunlight was to bright to see the screen so i went in the house to check them out. first photo shows a weird green orb. second photo shows same orb but gray in color and in a different position. i thought it was weird considering i just pushed the button one after the other. picture log shows they were taken in the same minute. the other five i took i didn't see anything weird till i e-mailed them to myself and looked at them on my computer. first one there's a faint blueish light at the top right of the picture. second shows a bit brighter and the third it seems to move. i cant tell if it really did move or i just moved the phone.In the last two photos there's nothing there or i moved and its not in the frame. i'm not sure
content.summary: Green orb in photo

content.detailedDescription:
I was relaxing over the rooftop of the 9 storeyed building looking at the stars when suddenly out of nowhere this ufo came into sight.
it was perfectly triangular with 5 sparsely visible light which were red in colour 3 of them on the apices of the triangle and two in between those lights.
it moved smoothly and swiftly from the sw-ne direction in a straight path.
the scene was similar to a flock of birds flyimg but undoubtedly they weren't birds. it flew straight away and disappeared farther in the sky no longer visible. it was sparsely visible and i doubt if even a dslr could capture it in the night sky. i showed it to my friend who couldn't see it properly. i told a friend about the incident who is interested in these stuff and gave me the site address and i following him reported it. a drawing is attached showing the position of the lights.
content.summary: Spotted a triangular shaped ufo with 5 red sparsely visible light.

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 1958, we were living in anza borrego state park. my father was a state ranger and i was in high school. we were returning home from borrego springs late at night back to our home in tamarisk grove. on the drive home off towards the mountains, approximately 2 to 3 miles away, was a large rectangular glowing white object, that was either on the ground or just over the ground. after only a few seconds it took off straight up and was gone. i asked rest of the family if they had seen it also but no one did and my father said it was probably just headlights from a car. i knew this was wrong because there was no roads towards the mountains in that area.

during this timeframe there have been reports of landings of cigar box shape glowing light objects at several locations in southern california. i never brought it up again but i know what i saw that night.

keep up the good work, someday will know for sure.

james l forsyth
content.summary: It was a large white glowing rectangular that after a short time shot straight up.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my best friends where walking down the long island railroad heading to my friends house,i just happen to look up in front of us and i see these 3 red/orange glowing circles in a tiangle formation,i was like look!Holy crap what is that!We all stood there in amazement not having any idea what we are looking at,just that it doesent look like anything we have ever seen in the sky before.Well,all my life i have allways wondered what that was we saw that night,well last night i was watching hanger 1 and one of the stories was about some kids that saw a triangle of lights on long island ny back in 1977,i was blown away!That is exactly what me and my friends saw!It has been so long i just cant remember what the lights did,all i can remember is the vision of seeing them in a triangle.I'am about to try and get a hold of one of the guys that was with me that night and see what he remembers about it.I just cant believe i saw the same thing that i saw on the show,i almost dident sleep one bit last night thinking about it,lol.Well it feels pretty neat knowing that we were not the only people that saw that,that night.
content.summary: 3 red/orange lights in a tiangle formation,like a pyramid shape,one at the top two at bottom

content.detailedDescription:
On thursday, 061815, about 1930hrs, i was driving north bound on highway 99, passing the city of ripon, ca.  i looked out to the west toward the hills.  there are no real obstructions between the freeway and the hills in this area, just fields.  i noticed a very bright light in the sky.  my first thought was it was a little early for the planet venus to be visible since the sun was still up and it was to low in the sky.  the light was very bright and stationary, it was hovering at about a 45 degree angle from me a few miles away. as i watched it, the light began to fade out.  the light continues to fade out until it is gone completely.  after the light was gone i could still see a gray, fuzzy something, it was far away and it to began to fade out until it disappeared all together. 

the next night i was in my backyard which is about 3 miles to the northwest as the crow flies from the area of the freeway that i saw the light the previuous day.  it was about 2230 hrs.  i was with my brother and children.  i was showing my brother the planets through my telescope.  i had just finished telling my brother about the bright light i saw the previous day, when he points to the east and says whats that?  i look in the direction and say what.  my brother says that star is moving. at first i don't notice anything, but as i continue to look i notice one of the stars is moving very slightly.   i also note the light which i thought was a star at first is beginning to fade out.  my brother also notes this.  as we stare at the light it fades out completely and my brother says something is there.  as i begin to try to swing the telescope toward the object it also fades out and disappears.   it never really moved that much the orginal location we saw it in, but just disappeared.
content.summary: Driving looked to west saw what i thought was venus very bright light, light faded and saw a dull hazzy shape that also faded until it disappeeared

content.detailedDescription:
On 12/31/2009 around 10:20pm i was outside by a campfire celebrating new years eve with a guest staying at the motel i owned in mancos, colorado. i looked up in the southern sky and saw a relatively large circular faint orange glowing object moving in a zig-zag manor until it came to a stop about 65* above the horizon. i pointed out the object to the motel guest and she too witnessed this event.  after the object came to a stop, it shot straight up super fast approximately 400ft then back down to the same spot. it then remained in the same spot for about 6 minutes, at which time it either turned around or just changed to a faint yellow color then took off into outer space and disappeared.  it was super, super fast.

about 20 minutes later, 2 more of the same appeared in the same location and did the exact same routine as the previous object.  all 3 appeared to go through a pre-flight warm up routine before taking off like a bat out of hell!

a few days later i saw the editor of the local newspaper (mancos times) and asked her if she had heard anything about the objects. she had indeed been contacted by another mancos resident and his son who described the same events i had seen.  she also mentioned that they had contacted the sheriffs office, the police dept and some other agencies- possibly the fbi. i asked her to tell them to stop by sometime so we could compare notes.  she did see this father&son a few days later and told them i had seen the same things and wanted to visit with them.  they suddenly changed their story and told her they didn't see anything that night!  someone must have paid them or threatened them to change their story.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: On 12/31/2009 myself and 3 other people observed 3 glowing orbs south of mancos, colorado

content.detailedDescription:
Standing in my back yard & watching stars i felt something & looked to my rt & there was a glowing/round object. it hovered about 3ft off ground & was 8-9 ft. across light was diffused & warm.

i felt a relaxed almost comforting feeling coming from it.

it was like we were just looking at each other & lasted for about a minute or more then it zipped off to the north for about 1-2 thousand ft then stopped & shown a light on the ground & again it zipped off about same distance but to n ne stopped & repeated the previous stated actions.

this went on for several minutes back & forth across the desert till it disappeared over a hill about 1-3 miles back.

a few sec later i saw jets going in same direction as globe.

i never felt scared or upset about the incident. it was more like a feeling of being familiar with it. 

i have seen several objects back there in desert.

also i should add that edwards air force base is ne of my home. in point of fact the fence to base is just 1000 or more from me.

my husband refuses to even acknowledge ufo's as he was air force & now retired.

please do not call on weekends or evenings!!
content.summary: Glowing orb 8-9 ft across hovering

content.detailedDescription:
For the week prior, i was intent on going stargazing, something in my mind occurred to me suddenly how i should go out and look at the stars. at the first opportunity available to me due to a hectic schedule, i looked outside my window and, unlike usual where i'd instinctly look left, i looked right first and i thought i saw an orange orb in the sky; but it quickly became apparent that this wasn't an orb as its appearance almost instantly turned to that of a trapezium craft; one trapezium in the top and another on the bottom: fitted together perfectly. it flashed a series of white (or gold), red and green lights from its exterior, as it stopped hovering and ascended; flying up slowly through the sky- though staying beneath the cloud level.

when it reached its maximum height at about 200ft, it hovered for a short duration of time whilst i took a series of 6 photographs; two of which caught an image of the object. then, it moved extraordinarily quickly through the cloudless sky over my terraced house's roof and i saw at the base of the craft was a brilliant white light; a circle, like a tractor beam, that didn't reflect off any materials.

when i saw the craft; i felt excited and equally scared. i have quite a lot of air traffic in my location, but i'd never seen anything like it. it shone lights unfamiliar to that of modern aeroplanes or helicopters, and was completely soundless until it flew overhead, where it made the sound not dissimilar to that of a supersonic boom, and i couldn't see it past that. i'd never seen any aerodynamic structure fly at that low height before. 

when it was out of sight, i wrote a basic account of what happened and texted some of my friends, attached with the two photographs of the event.
content.summary: A trapezium like craft ascended in the sky, hovered, then went west, flying overhead.

content.detailedDescription:
The pilot was contracted to fly alongside weather balloon launched from northern minnesota and flew westward towards ellsworth afb.  this was completed multiple times without incident. on one flight, as the balloon and aircraft were nearing the "drop zone" for the instrumented package on the balloon, near the air force base, the pilot notices a disk-shaped object near the balloon.  he photographed the object, the balloon and the object, and the wingtip of the aircraft with the balloon and the object in the background.  he radioed the sighting to the air base and asked if they saw the object on radar.  the air base controller instructed the pilot to complete some maneuvers, which the pilot did.  the controller stated that he did not see the object on radar.  the object remained near the balloon.  a moment later, when the pilot looked towards the balloon again, the object had disappeared.  
after the instrumented package was dropped form the balloon, the pilot circled the area until the package was picked up on the ground.  then the pilot requested permission to land at ellsworth afb to refuel and return to his base in minnesota.  this was the typical procedure at the end of each balloon-tracking event.  however, this time the pilot was ordered to land at another airport.  the pilot checked his air navigation map and discovered that the airport was shown to be closed.  the pilot replied that the airport was closed.  he was again instructed to land there.  on the final approach to the closed airport, the pilot noted abandoned hangers with no one on the ground.  once he landed on the runway, jeeps with personnel in them came out of the abandoned hangers and blocked his navion aircraft in front and in black of his aircraft.  he was interviewed in his aircraft.  his camera was taken and the film removed.  his camera was given back to him, without the film.  he was told that if he ever mentioned this to anyone, he would lose his contract - and more...

apparently, it was several years before he told a couple of his friends who were at the our local airport, sitting in the lobby during a blizzard outdoors.  they were "hanger flying".  the airport was empty, except for the four of us.  i was a teenager who worked at the airport and was sweeping the lobby floor.  for whatever reason, the pilot suddenly looked around, and then in a very hushed tone, began to describe the ufo event.  although there was no one else around, he talked in almost a whispered tone, and kept looking around to make sure no one else was listening.  he told everyone not to mention this to anyone else.  the pilot was the manager of the our local airport, in addition to his aircraft charter service.  he was also the executive pilot for a large company in our town which had an aero commander as their company plane, 

i viewed a "hanger one" series last night that discussed an incident near ellsworth afb, which caused me to contact you.  i have another second-hand account of a ufo landing on a golf course, about 1963 - 1964, which a good friend who worked at the golf course at night watering the golf course greens,told me of his experience.
content.summary: Gov't-contractracted pilot observed/photographed ufo and reported it to elsworkth afb.  pilot ordered to land at deserted airbase where his film was consficated by the air force.
content.locationName: Ellsworth Air Force Base, South Dakota

content.detailedDescription:
My parents and i had gone out for our normal friday night fish dinner and were on our way home when we saw the object.  my mother was the first to see it and pointed it out to my father.  i then leaned forward over the front seat and saw it. at the time i was about 10 or 11 years old, and growing up in the shadow of sjafb was fascinated by all aircraft. my mom asked dad if it looked like it was moving and he said he thought it wasn't. 

i think we were about 5 miles from home when we saw it. as we got closer to home we became convinced that the object was stationary and near our home. we wrere traveling south on nc 111 which was our normal route home. as we got closer to the road we lived on it was only about 1 mile further away, so mom told dad to keep going. we pulled off on the side of the road about 1/4 mile from the broadhurst bridge that crosses the neuse river.  the object was hovering silent over a house about 100 yards off the road. there were already 2 cars pulled off the road on the northbound side, a third pulled over soon after we did and another pulled over behind us.

dad and me got out, mom stayed in the car with a handgun she kept in the glove box. dad walked over and started talking to some people he knew, and i walked a little closer to the object, maybe 10 feet or so. it was definitely disc shaped and had a white glow. i knew immediately that it wasn't in the inventory of the usaf, because being a boy of that age i was fascinated and loved military aircraft and knew everything the us and ussr had. the disc was just above treetop level, i'd say about 50 fet off the ground. i'd say it was roughly 100 feet across. the man who owned the house it was hovering over, never making a sound came out, looked up and walked over to dad and asked him what it was, dad just shook his head.

i was about to walk over when mom called me back to the car. i was standing next to the car with her when i heard the jets, f4 phantoms,  scramble from the base. i thought " cool maybe they'll shoot it down ", but the disc shot off with blinding speed, never making a sound. the f4s flew directly over us, afterburners stiill on, i still remember the blue flames jetting out in the night. they were following it sw, but i doubt they caught it.
content.summary: My parents and i were coming home from supper when we saw it not far from our house. we observed the object for about 10 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out on front porch (forget why) looked to my right noticing a light in the sky which was brighter than a star. i looked at it wondering what it was. i thought it was a plane going away form me, but when it blinked off then on again i knew it was not a plane.
it was just a light from my point of view.It did not move, it just dimmed off and on.
am i really seeing a ufo ?  i stood and watched for a short time. i did not think of my camera.
after i was kind of shocked to have seen this.
i lost sight of it because i gave up wathing it. have not seen it sinch even though i had hoped to see it the next night.
content.summary: Light in sky would dim and blink off then blink on and get brighter repeatedlyou

content.detailedDescription:
we comming from event back to my where at  in wallingford this acured right around where i live i planning take here that time,it geting dark this acured . one she spot it walkingover railroad tracts.She  hy look up i th
ink i see ufo i look up seen 2 objects  one left us one right on us .

  one the left was signal the one on right  the one on right signal back to it we obsorved  good 10 mins nxt thing we notice puff in thine air like star trackclone system , the one on right change color blues whit to a orange type color i took me where i live to my car get my field classes to see what was it it was gone, neext night i see sam object  same part
of the sky,
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Iwas comming back from town  tast of wallingford rigt sun site i was with female friend 2 kids she spot  it  we watch for abut good 10mins object on my rgt was blinking to other object on the right , the one on   was smaller then one on the right the one

content.detailedDescription:
My father (name withheld) was a sr. engineer at morton/thiokol in karnak, tx from late fifties to 1983 when he died. he engineered missiles and rockets. one night ~ 3 am, he and another man were on a launch pad at thiokol. they were surrounded by orbs of lights. they were of many brilliant colors of whites, blues, yellows, etc. there was no noise from them. one of the men had a polaroid camera and took pictures of the event. i was told by my father's best friend at that time, it was my father who snapped the pics. the next morning they both were flown to dc to be debriefed. the pics were confiscated and they were threatened by the gov to shut up about this event. supposedly, the mib came to our home. i don't remember the event as i was 8 or 9 years of age then. my father told me about the story because he thought a kid wouldn't remember or pay attention. i heard everything. i did a book report in 3rd grade on project blue book. my teacher said, "how do you know this information. from where did i get my source?" i answered from my father. he wasn't a frightened man, but i can tell you he strongly disliked the project blue book gov organization. they threatened him. he, at that time, gave me a rock with strange properties. the rock/stone has been taken or is missing now. the stone about the size of a golf ball looked like iron ore. it was lighter than iron ore. it sat in the palm of my hand. it looked like an ordinary rock or stone; however, it was way different. it could be transformed into a rope of metallic twine. probably about ~12 inches. i held that stone for many years. my daughter remembers the rock. but, it is now gone. 

though this story is about my father and his ufo experience in ~ late 60's, i believe it has involved myself throughout the years. but, this is another story. perhaps, many visitations from beings a few times over the years. i've never felt alone and, to add, i'm not paranoid or psychologically impaired.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Thiokol, tx, 1960, my dad. sr. engineer nike hercules launch pad, mib, pics, stone

content.detailedDescription: Over the past 30 years there have been incidences with viewings of cylinder-like multiple (5-6) objects overhead with air force jets then following them upward until they vanished in the nj area, along with known experiences of being raised off the bed during sleep at various times.  these experiences continued when i moved to pennsylvania, but occurred more often and i became more aware, attempting to remain awake.  the encounters always happened at night, especially while the tv was off.  my dog would wake me barking frantically, then overhearing what sounded like a train or huge jet overhead.  when i calmed her down and returned to sleep, the encounters continued.  the most extraordinary and memorable encounter (which i will never forget) occurred late 2014 when i fell asleep on the couch around 11:10 pm (having glanced at the wall clock prior to falling asleep) with the tv off.  i awoke or tried to awake when i heard my dog barking frantically, pacing back and forth.  i opened my eyes, but my vision appeared as though something placed gel over my eyes b/c even though i could make out what was in front of me, it was not entirely a clear image.  i also felt something poking at my face and making noises (medium to high-pitch sounds).  it was as if this being was making fun of me somehow...Just poking its long brown/grey finger and touching my face..Cheeks..Forehead.  i tried to reach out and touch it, but felt paralyzed...Couldn't move at all.  i could make out its face, long 4 fingers that were in front of me, eyes, skin texture, and size.  i managed to glance upward and could make out the room..The clock on the wall, (then 11:20), the chairs, and table.  the dog was quiet then.  i had been laying on my left side and this extraordinary being was right next to me..Only a couple of inches away. since i found that i couldn't speak nor move, i attempted to relate mentally to leave me alone and that i needed rest.  i felt my eyes close and woke up...Then looking at the clock it was 11:30 pm. before going into such a transient state where you can't move or speak, i have felt the same sensations of diminished hearing, small cylinders or pistols going off within the brain, and hearing a loud jet-like or train-like roar prior to the encounter. this being was amazing! these encounters have also left sores and small indentations on my body over the years...With the latest one on my arms and lower right leg with present scars.
content.summary: Upfront encounter with alien being

content.detailedDescription: Really don't know what i saw
content.summary: Lit up the entire sky at first, i thought it was lightening, i took a few pictures i thought it might be the space shuttle at first

content.detailedDescription:
This ufo sighting was approximately around my first or second year in college in 1999-2000. my memory of this event happened a long time ago so it's difficult to recall exactly what occurred, but i could clearly remember what was happening before my eyes. 

this event occurred in canoga park, ca. it was night time around 8pm. i was hanging with 2 other friends in their neighborhood. v and t live in the same culdasac and lives a few houses apart. we usually go back and forth between their house, but in this case, we were walking from t's house to v's house. we ended just hanging outside talking in v's driveway. v then needed to go inside his house for something momentarily. while t and i were standing outside, we both noticed a strange light in the sky right above the santa monica mountains. i don't recall talking much during this event that lasted a few minutes. we were more in a trance-like state. 

i didn't know what i was seeing. it was a clear night. it wasn't a plane, helicopter, lanterns, or anything familiar. it wasn't a star or planet. the light seemed to be near just a couple miles away in the sky. this star-like object was much larger and more visible than everything else in the sky. it made no sound. it wasn't pulsating. it just seemed to have a steady bright glow. all of a sudden, the light multipled into two identical lights. not sure if the light separated from each other or just appeared out of nowhere. then slowly a third, forth, fifth, and sixth light would appear spread out in a linear formation spanning across the sky. these lights were just stationary for awhile until it started to move in different positions. i could see the lights moving from their linear form to different points in the sky. so now, these six individual lights are stationary in two triangular formations. i was in awe. i could not believe what i was seeing and never have i seen anything like this before. moments later, these two triangular objects in the sky would slowly rotate clockwise, then counter-clockwise like if i was turning a door knob. it would do this a couple of times. i could not take my eyes off these lights. it seemed like i was watching this for a long time. the lights which seem to be orb-like lights because of the movements would then slowly move back into linear formation. it was still, but apparently some lights started to fade away or just disappear. others lights would move towards each other and become one. eventually, a singular bright orb-like light was left just like what i initially saw in the sky. the light then faded away and as it disappeared i seem to come out of a trance-like state and looked at my friend t like wtf just happened? we looked ate each other with amazement. we started to trip out trying to understand what just happened. we made a lot of commotion. we immediately tried to yell out to my friend v who went inside the house to come out. and seconds later he came out to us telling him what just happened. all of a sudden, in the same direction to where the lights were, a helicopter appeared to come from behind the mountains toward our direction and flying away. i don't remember what it looked like though. i definitely knew for sure that these lights were out of this world. this helicopter was loud and moving quickly. the lights on the helicopter was also different. my friend v did not end up seeing the lights. he only knows what we told him. i wished we had iphones like today to record, but it is just a memory. something that i will never forget. it was rarely brought up again between us. i had a feeling my friend t never wants to talk about it. 

anyways, that night i went home, i tried to see if the lights my friend t and i saw made it on the news. i didn't see anything. i believe i researched the internet too, and watched videos of similar sightings. i was a believer. also during researching, there is a book published on ufo's over topanga canyon, which is coincidently in the same region to my own sighting. it could be the same thing, but i have never read it. goosebumps appear every time i see or hear anything about lights or orbs in the sky though. sadly, months went by and no sightings, but i was carrying a camera at all times. i was always looking up in the sky. i would see nothing. 

years flew by and i wasn't obsessed like i was before. one day i was at home and saw a series on tv about ufo's. i casually watched, because i always remembered that night. then one night i see i see an episode on the phoenix lights which i've never heard of before and it sparked my obsession again. i went online and researched. i would only be interested in similar sightings of my own, but i was surprised and intrigued with so much information on ufology and alien encounters. 

one day found myself reading about ufo's on the forums. i think it was a forum on the history channel's website under the show ufo hunters. i was just lurking at the time. i would read all the posts and discover so many things. i would read and find that there was always someone trying to bash or debunk people's claim. because of my own beliefs, i don't understand how a person could rationalize another persons views or sightings if he has never seen or experienced anything like it himself. i know there are fakes, but i don't believe they are all faked. and because of what i saw and how there are hundreds of similar sightings on footage now, i'm just amazed that people can't realize that we are not alone in this world. eventually i made an account and registered under the name lights. i posted what i witnessed on the forum, but now i cannot retrieve it. the forum is now gone from the website i think because the show cancelled. maybe it's been so long that i forgot how to get there. i'm kind of bummed because i want to know what i wrote and most importantly i want to lurk again. anyways i still watch ancient aliens or whatever ufo stuff is on tv throughout the years and these days, but i want to see new discoveries and sightings. i never really got into hanger 1 until now because i recently just saw an episode that interest me. and i am writing again to finally report what i witnessed many years ago because it was mentioned that i can do so. so i am. i hope this bit of evidence helps. i wasn't alone that day,  but in ways i feel like i am alone because i'm more open about it than he is. it's okay, we acknowledged what happened that night and that's enough for me to believe.
content.summary: Lights appeared, multiplied, 6 orbs formed a straight line, then rotated into two triangular formation, then one by one disappeared. helicopter appeared after.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to work at about 5:30 am on a clear, cold, starlit morning on interstate 90 near forsythe mt in the winter of 1981-82.   about 1 mile away from the colstrip interchange i observed a bright light on the left side of the highway about 100 feet off the ground.  i took this to be a new gas drilling rig which usually have a light on the top of the rig, shining down.  
as i came to the interchange the light was directly across the highway from me about 100 feet in altitude and a distance of about 200 feet.  the light appeared to be a high intensity search light scanning the ground, and it was moving slowly, maybe walking speed, to the west, parallel to the highway.  it was very similar to a search helicopter but there was absolutely no sound.  to make sure about the sound i turned off the vehicle and exited the car into the subzero morning and listened intently.  no sound.   then i noticed that the stars were not observable for a radius of perhaps 300 feet or more.  i shaded my eyes from the bright light but still could not see any stars except at the extreme horizon.
presently another car came up and parked. the guy jumped out and said, "what the hell is that?"  i replied that i didn't know and asked him to turn off his car and listen.  he did not hear anything either.  we stood there in the cold until he said, "i gotta get to work", and headed towards to the colstrip powerplants where i was going also.  i stayed for another 15 minutes or so.  the light turned to the north while scanning a coulee and the width of the light was about 100 feet on the ground.  
i don't recall specifically thinking anything except maybe wondering what or who this was.  maybe i thought about the object, wanting to communicate, but i don't recall.   it seemed clear to me that this was not a terrestrial object.  
the strange part is that i began having prophetic dreams shortly thereafter and they continued until 2007, always coming true.
content.summary: A single high intesity light projecting a cone shaped light on the ground.

content.detailedDescription:
location: arnheim, mi
shape:cone / triangle

two cone/triangle shaped u.F.O.S fly over head in broad daylight at tree top level and make no sound. cooper in color
 it was a wonderful summer day in upper mich. the time was around 12 o'clock noon and not a cloud in the sky. my step brother and myself were sitting on a barn roof looking into a big field where they would make hay. there is a tree line in the distance. looking at the tree line i noticed two, what i thought were planes coming strait at us but they made no sound at all. as they got closer i could see, they were what i would call cone or triangle  shaped. the only way to discribe the color of them is, like bronze or cooper. they were at about tree top level and they just kept coming, and still not a sound. these things were in a formation, as like a lead ship or whatever and the other, alittle behind and off to the side. (delta  formation) they got over head and that was close enough for me .I jumped off the roof and ran as fast as i could to the house with my step-brother in tow. i know it sounds insane but none the less, a true story. i watched them fly off out of sight in the distance from the safety of the house. that day has and will haunt me for the rest of my life....…
content.summary: Two cone shaped craft. cooper in color flying in a delta formation at tree top level pass over head and made no sound atall

content.detailedDescription: In 1973, not sure of the month, my girlfriend and i were on our way back to hurtsboro, al from having been at the drive in movies in auburn. around 10:00 probably, i noticed what i believed to be a shooting star in the distance.  it came down very fast and stopped momentarily at treetop level, about 30', then it took off at an incredible speed directly in the same direction we were heading.  it disappeared in the matter of a second or so. it was a disc shape and was a red glowing light. my girlfriend looked at me and asked if i had just seen that, and i told her i did. we were speachless after seeing this.  neither of us had ever seen anything like this before.  it most certainly was not a helicoptor or an airplane. during the three or four weeks before this event, several ufo sightings had been reported in the auburn area.
content.summary: Red object stopped, then took off incredibly fast parallel to highway.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were on our way to a green day concert at the la sports arena, which we had received free tickets to. we were on the 110 freeway heading south/southeast from the northridge area. a few miles prior to exiting the freeway (i don't recall the exact exit), we hit pretty severe traffic. a few minutes into the excrutiating stop-and-go (mainly stop) traffic, my buddy (the driver, as well as person who introduced me to hangar 1 as well as anonymousfo) said "whoa, dude! what are those?!" he pointed towards the eastern sky at 3 orange-ish/yellow-ish lights which formed the recurring triangle shape we see so often. my initial thought was that it must be military or show planes or helicopters flying together, as that's a fairly common occurrence. but after a solid couple minutes of watching, i realized they were hovering. they hadn't moved even slightly in the sky. keep in mind we were stopped in traffic, so after that amount of time, any craft i know of would have changed its location in the sky. then, within 2-3 minutes of my friend and i coming to the conclusion that we were finally witnessing the ufo triangle formation first-hand, and being quite ecstatic about that, more lights starting appearing out of nowhere. they didn't gradually get bright, they just appeared instantaneously. within minutes, there were 13-15 lights all in one small section of sky. at this point, they would all sit stationary for a bit, then all at once shift positions slightly, sit sationsru again, and so on. i was able to snap a series of pictures, though they are on an older iphone and the camera quality isn't the greatest. my friend and i were the two happiest guys in the world for days after that. i'm a huge believer that we not only are not alone, but that extraterrestrials have been deeply involved in our progress as a species for probably as long as we've been around. i do not know how long the lights were visible in the sky, nor if more appeared or anything. we reached our freeway exit and the lights went out of view from that point on.
content.summary: Multiple lights appear in a small section of sky. they hover, then shift position, then repeat.
